PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-01052019-02-25,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectHearings before the Standing Committee on Justice and Human Rights - Authorization and waiver Order
PrecisOrder (1) Authorizing the Honourable Jody Wilson-Raybould, former Attorney General of Canada, and any person who directly participated in discussions with her, to disclose to the Standing Committee on Justice and Human Rights and to the Conflict of Interest and Ethics Commissioner any confidences of the Queen's Privy Couincil for Canada concerning the prosecution of SNC-Lavalin; and (2) for the purposes of disclosure, waiving solicitor-client privilege and any other relevant duty of confidentiality to the Government of Canada concerning the prosecution of SNC-Lavalin.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
